text:
e="preserve">Aleksandr Sergeyevich Kabanov (, 11 June 1948 – 30 June 2020) was a Russian water polo player and head coach of the Russian water polo team. He was one of a few sportspeople who won Olympic medals in water polo as players and head coaches. He won two gold medals at the 1972 and 1980 Olympics.
Kabanov died on 30 June 2020, aged 72.
